nodes.text: "Gormaanda's Culinary Corner" was a column that appeared in HoloNet News newsfeeds throughout the Galactic Republic during the Republic's final years. In 22 BBY, during the Separatist Crisis, the availability of fresh ingredients in Republic space was becoming increasingly rare. Gormaanda responded by sharing a recipe for Glowblue Noodles and Chav, which could me made with a wider variety of different meats, or none at all. In her column, Gormaanda cared for her readers' appetites as well as their pocketbooks.
